metadata.title: CVE-2021-4235 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
Due to unbounded alias chasing, a maliciously crafted YAML file can causethe system to consume significant system resources. If parsing user input,this may be used as a denial of service vector.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4235` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

golang-gopkg-yaml.v2-dev - 2.2.2-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: golang-github-coreos-discovery-etcd-io package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
golang-yaml.v2 package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.2.2-1ubuntu0.1').
kubernetes package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
webhook package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
